name: Mini Many Practice Shooter
description:
This is just a practice on making a shooter and I'm just trying to practice making different kind of games:)

Also the game instructions are in the .zip folder

If you downloaded the game on the itch app then to quit hold down option/alt and command and escape and you can force quit the game and you want to do that. The same thing goes to the people who didn't download the game on the itch app I also put the instructions in the .zip folder. Its not the same on windows.
